0000.name: Unknown
0000.message:
An error has occurred.
Please try again later.

If the problem persists, please
make a note of the error code and
visit support.nintendo.com.
0000.short_solution: Miiverse: Reinstall Nimbus and make sure rverse is no longer installed on your system.
0000.long_solution:
This assumes you have rverse, if you don't remember to have installed it, don't install it. Follow these steps:

1. Delete rev.pem in sd:/3ds directory
2. Reinstall Nimbus, either from Github or Universal Updater
3. Launch Miiverse, if you no longer get this error code your issue is fixed!
